data_sources.description: Dataset containing diffusion-related data used for training the model, including image file paths and prompts.

data_variables.name: CFG
data_variables.description: Configuration class that contains model parameters such as model name, input size, batch size, number of epochs, learning rate, and seed for randomness.

data_variables.name: trn_df
data_variables.description: Training DataFrame after splitting the original dataset. It contains the data used for training the model.

data_variables.name: val_df
data_variables.description: Validation DataFrame after splitting the original dataset. It contains the data used for validating the model.

data_variables.name: dataloaders
data_variables.description: A dictionary containing PyTorch DataLoader objects for the training and validation datasets.

data_variables.name: model
data_variables.description: The deep learning model created using the timm library, structured for training with specific parameters.

models.input_features: Image tensor inputs from the training dataset
